title: Ping spiking every 20 seconds? My ISP or Riot servers?
body:
http://logsoflag.com/#Truh2vCXNV3
http://logsoflag.com/#bKqbaYT8by0
http://logsoflag.com/#ltT8D5ExJDq


Here are some of my game logs

Ever since 2 days ago, I have experienced lag where every 10 seconds my normal 8-10 MS ping will jump to 50-150MS all of a sudden before dropping back to 8-10MS for like 10 seconds and repeating once again. I've tried restarting my modem several times to no avail
Ping usually spikes the hardest to 100-200 during teamfights mostly as well.

Please I look forward to ur swift reply!
